ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Automated image captioning for training and fine-tuning diffusion models.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Free and Open: Open weights, no restrictions, training scripts provided. â€¢ Uncensored: Equal coverage of SFW and NSFW concepts. â€¢ Diversity: Broad coverage of image styles, content, ethnicity, gender, orientation, etc. â€¢ Minimal Filtering: Trained on large datasets to understand almost all aspects of our world, excluding illegal content.
ðŸ“– Summary: JoyCaption is an open-source Visual Language Model (VLM) designed for image captioning. It aims to provide a free, uncensored alternative to existing models like ChatGPT, enabling the training and fine-tuning of diffusion models on a wider range of images with diverse content and styles.
